TextView.android:text: Pursuit is an application designed to help people connect with companies for the purpose of setting up a job shadowing experience. Pursuit accommodates two types of users; Companies and Applicants. Companies can create profiles where they can post openings for jobs they have available for shadowing. Applicant users can create profiles that serve as a sort of resume and will have the ability to search for jobs/companies that are offering shadowing opportunities. On their profile they will also be able to specify certain locations and/or jobs they are interested in and be alerted when an opportunity arises that matches their criteria.
